SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Join millions of users and start connecting!
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How did you hear about us?
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Join our social network and experience the power of digital connections. Share your life, discover new friendships, and stay in touch with loved ones.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay in touch with your loved ones, share updates, and build meaningful relationships in our vibrant social network.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Post photos, videos, and status updates to express yourself and keep your friends updated on your life's moments.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Join groups and pages that match your interests, connecting with like-minded individuals and exploring new passions.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Chat instantly with friends and family through our integrated messaging system, making communication seamless and fun.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Stay informed with a curated feed of posts from friends, pages you follow, and trending topics tailored to your interests.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Manage your online presence with robust privacy settings, ensuring you have full control over who sees your content and information.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our social networking platform
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I create an account?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: To create an account, simply click the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage, enter your details, and follow the verification process. It's quick and easy!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, we take your privacy seriously. We use advanced encryption and security measures to protect your personal information and data.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How can I add friends on the platform?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can add friends by searching for their name or email, sending friend requests, or importing contacts from your email or phone. You can also discover new connections through mutual friends.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What features does your platform offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our platform offers a wide range of features including personal profiles, news feed, photo and video sharing, messaging, groups, events, and more. We're constantly adding new features to enhance your social networking experience.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our basic features are completely free to use. We may offer premium features or ad-free experiences in the future, but our core social networking functionality will always be free.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What features does your Facebook clone offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app offers core social networking features including profile creation, friend connections, news feed, photo sharing, messaging, and status updates, mimicking the essential Facebook experience.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, our Facebook clone is completely free to use. We aim to provide a familiar social networking experience without any cost to our users.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How does user privacy and data protection work in your app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We take user privacy seriously. Our app employs robust encryption, customizable privacy settings, and adheres to data protection regulations to ensure your information remains secure and under your control.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I import my Facebook friends and data to this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: While we don't directly import data from Facebook due to privacy policies, we offer easy ways to find and connect with friends, such as phone contact syncing and email invitations.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Create and customize your personal profile
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Personalized content stream from friends and pages
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Add friends and manage your social circle
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Upload, tag, and share photos with friends
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Organize and join events, create and manage groups
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 ConnectMe. All rights reserved. Connect, share, and engage with friends and family.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: New: Introducing enhanced privacy features and customizable news feed!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Connect, Share, and Engage in a Familiar Way
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Experience the power of social networking with our Facebook-inspired platform. Stay connected with friends, share your moments, and discover content that matters to you.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay in touch with friends, family, and colleagues through real-time updates and messaging.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Post photos, videos, and thoughts to your personal timeline or groups with ease.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Explore new content, join communities, and stay informed about events and news that matter to you.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Connected with Our Social Revolution
HERO_SUBTITLE: Create meaningful connections, share life's moments, and stay in touch with friends and family – all in one place.
CTA_BODY: Experience the next evolution of social networking with our Facebook-inspired platform. Build meaningful connections, share your life's moments, and stay updated with friends and family all in one place.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Discover how our platform is connecting people and transforming lives
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized the way I stay in touch with friends and family. It's like having everyone I care about in one place!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've reconnected with old classmates and made new friends from around the world. This platform truly brings people together!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: From sharing life updates to discovering local events, this app has become an essential part of my daily routine.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Your new social hub for friends and family
